data.fullContent: The Hufflepuff Common Room door is near the kitchens, in the dungeons. It is a quite cozy and welcoming place, not at all like a dungeon. In the room there are yellow hangings and fat armchairs, with little underground tunnels that take the students to their sleeping rooms. The tunnels have round doors like barrel-tops.
data.answer: 赫奇帕奇公共休息室的门靠近厨房，在地下教室里。这是一个相当舒适和受欢迎的地方，一点也不像一个地牢。教室里有黄色的帷幔和宽大的扶手椅，里面有一条小小的地下通道，可以把学生们带到他们的卧室。隧道有像桶顶一样的圆门。
